import api from"./api";// Get all tags
export const getTags=async()=>{const response=await api.get("/tags");return response.data;};// Get tag by ID
export const getTagById=async id=>{const response=await api.get("/tags/".concat(id));return response.data;};// Create new tag
export const createTag=async tagData=>{const response=await api.post("/tags",tagData);return response.data;};// Update tag
export const updateTag=async(id,tagData)=>{const response=await api.put("/tags/".concat(id),tagData);return response.data;};// Delete tag
export const deleteTag=async id=>{const response=await api.delete("/tags/".concat(id));return response.data;};// Get roadmaps by tag ID
export const getRoadmapsByTagId=async id=>{const response=await api.get("/tags/".concat(id,"/roadmaps"));return response.data;};
